column4: Hi: I'm a NOOB trying to install warty. Why can't I get an address by DHCP ? I am connected to ethernet port of a D-Link router (624). I get DHCP in Win98 with this set-up.
It might not have properly detected your network card.
you can see if  "ifconfig -a" shows eth0
it depends on if it detected your nic or not.
